metadata.name: Daisies under the Moon
metadata.description:
Daises under the Moon is a song i wrote in a countryside in Moscow, Russia in the summer of June this year when i was walking with my wife picking daisies for my mother in law in the wild forest. I walked and came back to the wooden countryside home we were staying in, picked up a guitar and started writing that song... my step dad-in-law was chilling there and my wife too, i distinctly remember. 

It's also a song of hope as i narrate, in my native tongue in the bridge-ish portion, imagining myself to be a bird flying in the night sky looking for something, and being reminded somehow, that i belong to the earth not the skies. 

The artwork is a beautiful piece made by my friend @KathedralNFT.

Song written, music composed, mixed, mastered by myself, krp. 

Utility... hmm well for one the music is the utility folks! Apart from that:

1. Feel free to hit me up for a 1-1 call
2. Mixing, production, mastering chat
3. Id love to play flute on one of your tracks, just hit me up :)
4. If ever you are in India, id love to take you to one of the temples here! We have a rich heritage of beautiful temples. 
5. Stems to the song on demand, feel free to use them as samples or anything!

lyrics.text:
Let me tell of the day 
A tale for the years 
Something to sing by the fire 
A Song to rest your eth on

something to sing when your heart is racing
something to sing when your heart is bleeding

Gungunaye aasmaan mein raat ke andheri mein
teri zameen bulaaye
kahin ghum ho na ho
kahin saans tham na ho
Saveraa hone ko hai

(I hum in the sky, in the darkness of the night,
The earth is calling me 
She says, don't get lost
Don't pass on too soon 
Dawn us yet to be - as in there's miles to go before I die, so keep going despite obstacles) 

Let me sing of the day when the sky was roaring blue
I had my girl by my side
I rode under the sun of june
I sat and picked up daisies under the moon.

Hmmm

Let me tell you of the day 
A tale for the years 
Something to sing by the fire 
A song to rest you eth on
something to sing when your heart is racing
something to sing when your heart is bleeding
